pred_diverse_ans: Glucose and insulin are the two hormones that control blood sugar levels.
Glucose is a nutrient that is absorbed by the body.
regulating the release of glucose from glycogen stores
They are a pair of hormones that control blood sugar levels.
The effects of insulin and glucagon are primarily a result of the effects of glucose on the cells of the pancreas.
